labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!039 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australien', 'Belgien', 'Norwegen', 'Zyklische Konsumgüter & Dienstleistungen', 'Nicht-zyklische Konsumgüter & Dienstleistungen'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australien', 'Norwegen']

Failed: Bug # 55!039  Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australien', 'Hongkong', 'Italien', 'Grundstoffe', 'Energie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Italien']
